source.760162a5:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
fig = plt.figure(figsize = (10, 5))
 
# creating the bar plot
plt.bar(train_set_new['comments'], train_set_new['reactions'], color ='maroon',
        width = 0.4)
 
plt.xlabel("Comments")
plt.ylabel("Reactions")
plt.title("Comments Vs reactions")
plt.show()
